etag.description: Gets or sets the etag of the resource.

AutomationAccount.description: Definition of the automation account type.

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

location.description: Gets or sets the location of the resource.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the resource.

tags.description: Gets or sets the tags attached to the resource.

AutomationAccountCreateOrUpdateParameter.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update automation account operation.

AutomationAccountCreateOrUpdatePropertie.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update account properties.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

value.description: Gets or sets list of accounts.

AutomationAccountListResult.description: The response model for the list account operation.

lastModifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the last modified by.

location.description: Gets or sets the location of the resource.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the resource.

tags.description: Gets or sets the tags attached to the resource.

AutomationAccountUpdateParameters.description: The parameters supplied to the update automation account operation.

AutomationAccountUpdateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the update account properties.

Value.description: Value of the Automation Key used for registration.

Key.description: Automation key which is used to register a DSC Node

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Runbooks, Jobs etc.

value.description: List of Automation operations supported by the Automation resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: The response model for the list of Automation operations

capacity.description: Gets or sets the SKU capacity.

family.description: Gets or sets the SKU family.

name.description: Gets or sets the SKU name of the account.

counterProperty.description: Gets the property value of the statistic.

counterValue.description: Gets the value of the statistic.

endTime.description: Gets the endTime of the statistic.

startTime.description: Gets the startTime of the statistic.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of statistics.

StatisticsListResult.description: The response model for the list statistics operation.

currentValue.description: Gets or sets the current usage value.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the resource.

limit.description: Gets or sets max limit. -1 for unlimited

throttleStatus.description: Gets or sets the throttle status.

unit.description: Gets or sets the usage unit name.

localizedValue.description: Gets or sets the localized usage counter name.

value.description: Gets or sets the usage counter name.

UsageListResult.description: The response model for the get usage operation.
